subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Scott Hartnell scored three goals for the second time in five games and Antero Niittymaki stopped a season-high 47 shots Saturday in the Flyers’ victory over Washington.
snippet: Scott Hartnell scored three goals for the second time in five games and Antero Niittymaki stopped a season-high 47 shots Saturday in the Flyers’ victory over Washington.
